description: I am a new Computer Engineer in the field. I love programming and customizing Operating Systems.

about.title: About me
about.p1: Junior Programmer recently graduated from the University of Las Palmas de Gran Canaria.
about.p2: I love Web development, as well as Computer Science in general terms.
about.list:
• - Customization of Operating Systems
  • - Automating tasks
  • - Software programming
  • - Learning new technologies

tft.title: TFT-Gallery of NFTs within Web 3.0
tft.description: This web application was my Final Degree Project in Computer Engineering at ULPGC. It consists of an NFT Gallery that makes use of Smart Contracts. In addition, it provides a link between different crypto wallets that are within the Ethereum network.

homethings.title: Home-Things
homethings.description: This application is my first hybrid development, with the intention of having basic lists to be able to control food, cleaning products and other necessary elements for day-to-day life.

documentation.title: Documentation
documentation.description: This page was made with the intention of learning to document information. In this case, the initiation to several libraries that are quite useful for day-to-day, such as Docsify itself to create documentation, or Concurrently, a library that provides us with concurrent processes in node.
